widget.download-clashmeta: Open the page on GitHub or F-Droid, download and install the application.
widget.add-subscription-description-clashmeta: Click the button below to open the profile creation window. You will need to specify the auto-update period, for example, 720 minutes. Click the Save button in the top right corner.
widget.connect-and-use-description-clashmeta: Go to the Profiles section and select the created profile, then return to the main page. Now you can connect by clicking the Stopped button.
widget.open-github: Open the GitHub page, download and install the application.
widget.connect-and-use-description-singbox: On the main Dashboard page, click the Enabled button to connect to the VPN.
widget.install-flclash-description: Open the GitHub page, download and install the application.
widget.select-server-flclash: In the main Dashboard section, click the power button in the bottom right corner to connect to the VPN. If necessary, select a different server in the Proxy section. Enjoy! :)
widget.open-google-play: Open the page in Google Play and install the app.
widget.add-subscription-description: Click the button below — the app will open and the subscription will be added automatically.
widget.connect-and-use-description: In the main section, click the large power button in the center to connect to VPN. Don't forget to select a server from the server list. If needed, choose a different server from the server list.
widget.install-app-store-description: Open the page in the App Store and install the app. Launch it, in the VPN configuration permission window click Allow and enter your passcode.
widget.add-ios-subscription-description: Click the button below — the app will open and the subscription will be added automatically.
widget.install-hiddify-description: Install the app. Launch it, select Russia region, then click Start.
widget.add-subscription-pc-description: Click the button below — the app will open and the subscription will be added automatically. If this doesn't happen, close the app and try again.
widget.select-server-hiddify: In the main section, click the large power button in the center to connect to VPN. If needed, select a different server in the Proxy section.
widget.install-clash-verge-rev: Install and open Clash Verge Rev
widget.install-clash-verge-rev-description: Open the GitHub page, download and install the application.
widget.select-server-clash-verge-rev: In the main Dashboard section, click the power button in the bottom right corner to connect to the VPN. If necessary, select a different server in the Proxy section. Enjoy! :)

widget.scan-qr-code: Scan the QR code above in the client
widget.line-1: Easy subscription addition to any client. There's another option: copy the link below and paste it into the client
